alert.note: Alert for Grainger; Hamblen; Jefferson; Knox; Union (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 12:45PM CDT until June 17 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Knox County in east Tennessee... Northwestern Jefferson County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Grainger County in east Tennessee... Southeastern Union County in east Tennessee... West central Hamblen County in east Tennessee... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 145 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Plainview, or near Maynardville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jefferson City, Dandridge, Plainview, New Market, Strawberry Plains, Blaine, Luttrell, House Mountain State Park, Piedmont and Mascot. This includes Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 412 and 416. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
